textBeforeTable: 1) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) on your own? (Q1OWN) All frequencies are raw numbers (no weights used). textAfterTable: [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 2) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) with family? (Q1FAMILY) TOTAL % 1) Never 330 74.5 2) Once or twice 61 13.8 3) A few times 33 7.4 4) Often, but not daily 11 2.5 5) At least daily 8 1.8 Missing 31   TOTAL 443 100.0 [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 3) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) in connection with a group devoted specifically to Bible study? (Q1BSTUDY) TOTAL % 1) Never 321 73.1 2) Once or twice 78 17.8 3) A few times 17 3.9 4) Often, but not daily 21 4.8
